org.grobid.core.sax

Class PDFALTOSaxHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.grobid.core.sax.PDFALTOSaxHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class PDFALTOSaxHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    SAX parser for XML ALTO representation of fixed layout documents. Typographical and layout information are defined at token level, with line and block structures. This parser supports: - pdfalto output from PDF Expected coverage includes ALTO files generated by OCR (e.g. ABBYY) and ALTO files generated from docx files. TBD: character-level ALTO files
